mapper.insert: insert into ms_board(title, content, nickname, sort) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{sort})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, sort, nickname, reg_date, view_cnt from ms_board order by reg_date DESC, bno DESC
select bno, title, content, sort, nickname, reg_date, view_cnt from ms_board where bno = #{bno} order by reg_date DESC, bno DESC
select bno, title, content, sort, nickname, reg_date, view_cnt from ms_board order by reg_date DESC, bno DESC limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
